Session 1 - Creating Inner Harmony Date and Time ______________________________________________ Now that you are working at the Adept Level, you have a ll the tools you need for accom plishing nearly anything that you want in life. You understand all the components of your consciousness. All that's necessary is to actively create a singular direction in your life. Take out your goals. Review them to be certain which ones you have already accomplished and to discover if there are any that you no longer desire. Compare your goals with your values and your beliefs, and compare these with the emotions that you experience. You must now systematically make adjustments to your values, add or remove beliefs and emotions. Use all of the technologi es that you have learned. What beliefs do yo u need to accomplish your goals? Install them. What emotions might you need to get where you want to go? Create anchors. What painful feelings do you experience that might get in your way? Change them into pleasure. What values and rules do you have that are in conflict with your goals? Adjust them. Work on ever y part of your life until you are energized and prepared to take consistent action toward your goals. Session 2 - Communion with Cosmic Consciousness This tool is really the whole purpose of the New Hermetics. Its intention is to establish a permanent and repeatable link between your consciousness and cosmic consciousn ess. Really any of the "mystical" tools of the New Hermetics might result in this union, but this is simp ly a direct way of approaching this consciousness.
